ygData.subject: Re: The old brass problem
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been having the same problem myself. I figured out after sitting for about 5 hours in the same spot and playing playstation that I was using an
ygData.messageBody:
I have been having the same problem myself. I figured out after sitting for
about 5 hours in the same spot and playing playstation that I was using an
"Unfinished" Horn and I was wondering why my skill didnt increase. Any idea
where we can get the regular horn. I have looked in freeport so far in the
guild and they dont have it.

Taerian Valmont of Povar


> From: Valharick@...
>
> You want to use a plain ol' horn. And you will miss MANY notes at first. I
> would suggest going someone far away from people, kicking the song up, and
> let it sit for a couple hours. That will give you a good start into the
> skill. And contrary to what some people say, you do not have to have a
target
> for the skill to rise.
> The place I chose for my AFK practice was in Qeynos Hills all the way
across
> the zone from the entrance to the karana's, up on the hill. I didn't see
one
> living thing and even after letting it sit all night I was still alive :)
> Anyways, good luck to ya.
>
> Renaldo Rallentando of the 34th String
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
